DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effectiveness Weight Watchers , brief behavioral treatment , combination treatment . We hypothesize combination treatment achieve great weight loss Weight Watchers alone .
DOC.brief_title: Brief Behavioral Weight Loss Treatment v . Weight Watchers
DOC.detailed_description: Weight Watchers popular nonmedical commercial weight loss program . Recent study suggest people enrol Weight Watchers lose approximately 3-5 kg 6 month treatment . These outcome substantially low average weight loss achieve 6 month university/hospital-based standard behavioral treatment ( approximately 10 kg ) . However , standard behavioral weight loss program expensive limited accessibility people seek weight loss . Therefore , purpose current study investigate whether enhance Weight Watchers add 8-week group-based behavioral weight loss program prior participation Weight Watchers improve weight loss outcomes 6 month . Comparison : 6 month Weight Watchers vs. combination treatment ( 2 month standard behavioral weight loss treatment follow 4 month Weight Watchers ) vs. 2 month standard behavioral treatment .
DOC.criteria: Age 2165 year BMI 2745 kg/m2 Able sign inform consent Women pregnant , nursing , less 6 month postpartum , plan become pregnant course study Individuals report medical condition would affect safety and/or efficacy weight management program involve dietary change physical activity ( e.g. , heart disease , cancer ) Individuals major psychiatric illness would interfere protocol adherence Individuals currently participate weight loss program take weight loss medication lose > =5 % body weight 6 month prior screen Recent ( within past 12 month ) participation Weight Watchers
